preface.title: Foreword
preface.para: Cejug-Classifieds uses 100% open source software, no paid tools or libraries are required or promoted by our project.

Developer manual contains information about accessing the latest source code for Cejug-Classifieds project and process of modifying, committing and building the project. The commands and other technical tips containned in this manual are based on Linux operatinal system. We strongly suggest you to adopt Linux to setup your development environment.
